title: PBE Not logging in?
body:
I'm trying to log in to test out the sandbox mode on PBE, but it just says invalid username/password combination.
Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
Make sure you're using the right username or password to login. You can use the links below to ensure this:

1. [**Recover your username**](https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/forgot-username) with your email.
2. Reset your password with [**this page**](https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/forgot-password).

Let me know if this helped!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sAzVh4pa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-15T23:47:24.421+0000)
>
> Make sure you're using the right username or password to login. You can use the links below to ensure this:
> 
> 1. [**Recover your username**](https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/forgot-username) with your email.
> 2. Reset your password with [**this page**](https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/forgot-password).
> 
> Let me know if this helped!

It isnt sending the email to my account.

In that case, I'd recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) so one of our recovery specialists can assist you with your account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
